mapper.update: update cuckoo.syspl_affiche set affiche_title = #{afficheTitle}, affiche_invalidate = #{afficheInvalidate}, affiche_pulish = #{affichePulish}, affiche_content = #{afficheContent} where affiche_id = #{afficheId}
mapper.select: select affiche_id as afficheId, affiche_title as afficheTitle, affiche_invalidate as afficheInvalidate, affiche_pulish as affichePulish, affiche_content as afficheContent from cuckoo.syspl_affiche where affiche_id = #{id}
select count(*) > 0 from cuckoo.syspl_affiche where affiche_id = #{id}
select * from cuckoo.syspl_affiche where affiche_pulish = 0 and affiche_invalidate >= #{afficheInvalidate}
